definition: Ye Shengtao (1894-1988), writer and editor, known esp. for children's books

sentences.english: The thought of Mr. Ye Shengtaos Chinese practice is extremely rich.
sentences.chinese: 叶圣陶先生的语文实践思想极其丰富。

definition: Tao Xingzhi (1891-1946), Chinese educator and reformer
Xu Dishan (1893-1941), journalist, publisher and novelist
Wen Yiduo (1899-1946), poet and patriotic fighter, executed by Guomindang in Kunming
Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
Zou Taofen (1895-1944), journalist, political theorist and publisher
Ba Jin (1904-2005), novelist, author of the trilogy 家, 春, 秋
Lao She (1899-1966), Chinese novelist and dramatist
Zhang Tianyi (1906-1985), children's writer, author of prize-winning fairy tale Secret of the Magic Gourd 寶葫蘆的秘密|宝葫芦的秘密[Bao3 hu2 lu5 de5 Mi4 mi4]

Zhou Zuoren (1885-1967), brother of Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅, academic in Japanese and Greek studies, briefly imprisoned after the war as Japanese collaborator, persecuted and died of unknown causes during the Cultural Revolution
Ji Xianlin (1911-2009), Chinese linguist and Indologist
